attributes.action:
Sort out Leicester Buses
By Natalie Coventy and John C
attributes.additional_details:
Please like our Facebook Page 
@Sort Out Leicester Buses 
Facebook Group  @Sort Out Leicester Buses

By Youtube Blogger John C and Natalie Coventry
attributes.background: We are trying to Sort out free travel for kids attending school in Leicester as the kids should go free  like other parts of Uk  like London as it is for Education

rejection.details:
This would the responsibility of your local authority and transport companies and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
